title: Council Decision of 6 October 1995 appointing the Austrian, Finnish and Swedish members of the Advisory Committee on Medical Training
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 6 October 1995 appointing the Austrian, Finnish and Swedish members of the Advisory Committee on Medical Training (95/C 272/01)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community,
Having regard to the 1994 Act of Accession, and in particular Article 165 (1) thereof,
Having regard to Council Decision 75/364/EEC of 16 June 1975 setting up an Advisory Committee on Medical Training (1), and in particular Articles 3 and 4 thereof,
Having regard to the candidates submitted to the Council by the Austrian, Finnish and Swedish Governments,
Whereas, by its Decision of 25 July 1994 (2), the Council appointed the members and alternate members of the Advisory Committee on Medical Training for the period up to 24 July 1997;
Whereas it is necessary to appoint the Austrian, Finnish and Swedish members and alternates for the same period,
main_body:
The following are hereby appointed members and alternate members of the Advisory Committee on Medical Training for the period ending on 24 July 1997:
>TABLE>
>TABLE>
>TABLE>
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 6 October 1995.
For the Council
The President
J. BORRELL FONTELLES
(1) OJ No L 167, 30. 6. 1975, p. 17.
(2) OJ No C 221, 9. 8. 1994, p. 1.
